txt.en: This scavenger hunt card has a list of things to find. They could be anywhere!
Eriador Year 11 Trifles: Long List of the Ents
Eagle in eyrie
Cards hang from the Party Tree. Each card contains a scavenger hunt to complete at your own pace.
You completed a scavenger hunt card!
Buck the leaper
Hawk is swiftest
This buck is happily running and leaping through the forest
These two boars are fighting for dominance!
Bear bee-hunter
Bad dog!
Completed scavenger hunt card.
This snake is trying to sun itself on the stones
These two are heartily enjoying the festivities!

'If you are reading this, little one, then I'm about to save you valuable time. You are no doubt seeking the Long List of Ents. I spoke to Treebeard and this is what he told me...'

'Buck the leaper. Hmm, I have heard stories of the feisty bucks near Imladris. Always in such a hurry! Hoom.

'Bear bee-hunter. Ahh, perhaps in the fields near Iarwain Ben-adar's dwelling? But, be cautious of the evil-hearted one. Hm.

'Boar the fighter. Full of pride and wroth, these creatures. Hmm, perhaps near the Greenway?

'Hound is hungry. Hounds are usually with their masters, Men, hmm! Try where many men gather together to eat.

'Eagle in eyrie. Hoom! But you would need wings to reach the Eyrie! Perhaps you can catch a glimpse of one in the Misty Mountains.

'Hawk is swiftest. I hear many birds now dwell within the ruins of Eregion. Hoom. It pains me to think of that place.

'Serpent coldest. I have heard that serpents must warm themselves on sun-baked stones. Hm. Perhaps on just the edge of a very cold place.

'The Hobbit children, the laughing-folk, the little people. Ah, they have told me themselves that they dwell in the land called the Shire!'

-A friend
The bear hungrily eyes the beehive in this tree
Completed

Every year in the spring, the Anniversary Scavenger Hunt takes place to celebrate a very special occasion.

<rgb=#00FF00> This version of the quest includes only objectives found within Eriador and is available to players of all levels. </rgb>

<rgb=#FF0000> NOTE: This quest will be removed from your quest log when the current festival ends. </rgb>
Serpent coldest

The Hobbit children, the laughing-folk, the little people
Boar the fighter
The Great Eagle acknowledges you with a nod
Find the Long List of Ents assistance scroll
Hound is hungry
This hawk is looking for prey from a high vantage point
